intro: Get found on Google Maps and Search. Set up your Google Business Profile in minutes and start getting more local customers.
setupSteps: Go to google.com/business and click 'Manage now'
Search for your business name and address
Claim your business or create a new listing
Fill in your business details (name, address, phone, website)
Pick your main category and add services
verificationMethods: Postcard verification: Google sends a code to your business address (5-14 days)
Phone verification: Get a code via SMS or call (if eligible)
Email verification: For some businesses, instant verification via email

optimiseSections.title: Categories & Services
tips: Pick your main category carefully - it affects how you show up in searches
Add 5-10 relevant services that customers search for
Use Google's suggested categories, not made-up ones
Review categories every 6 months as Google adds new ones

optimiseSections.title: NAP (Name, Address, Phone)
tips: Keep your business name exactly as it appears on your signage
Use your real business address, not a PO Box
Add a local phone number, not a mobile if possible
Match your NAP details on your website and other directories

optimiseSections.title: Description
tips: Write 150-200 words about what makes you special
Include your main services and location
Mention years in business and qualifications
Add a call-to-action like 'Call for free quote'

optimiseSections.title: Photos
tips: Add at least 10 high-quality photos
Include: exterior, interior, team, products, work samples
Use landscape orientation (horizontal photos work best)
Upload new photos monthly to stay active

optimiseSections.title: Posts
tips: Post weekly updates, offers, or news
Use the event post type for special promotions
Add a clear call-to-action and link to your website
Include photos or videos in every post

optimiseSections.title: Reviews
tips: Ask happy customers to leave reviews
Respond to all reviews within 24-48 hours
Thank positive reviewers and address negative feedback professionally
Use review templates to save time

optimiseSections.title: Q&A
tips: Add 5-10 common questions customers ask
Include: opening hours, payment methods, parking, pricing
Answer questions from customers quickly
Keep answers short and helpful

optimiseSections.title: Messaging & Calls
tips: Turn on messaging to let customers contact you directly
Set up auto-replies for out-of-hours messages
Add a click-to-call button with your main number
Respond to messages within a few hours

optimiseSections.title: Hours & Holidays
tips: Set accurate opening hours for each day
Add special hours for holidays and events
Update hours if you change them temporarily
Mark yourself as 'temporarily closed' if needed

optimiseSections.title: Products & Services
tips: Add your main products or services with photos
Include prices where possible
Write short descriptions for each item
Link to your website for more details

linksTracking.utmHelp: UTM codes help track which Google Business Profile clicks become customers.

suspensionHelp: Use your real business name, address, and phone number
Don't stuff keywords into your business name
Remove any promotional text from your business description
Make sure your website matches your business details
performanceTips: Check your Google Business Profile insights monthly
Track how many people view your profile, visit your website, and call
Compare your performance to last month
Focus on getting more reviews and photos if engagement is low
weeklyChecklist: Check and respond to new reviews
monthlyChecklist: Review your Google Business Profile insights
Update your business description if needed
Check your opening hours are correct
